mapper.insert: insert into `user` (username, contact, `type`, phone, state, location, address, createTime) values (#{username}, #{contact}, #{type}, #{phone}, #{state}, #{location}, #{address}, #{createTime})
insert into `recharge` (id, tradeNo, uid, source, `type`, payAccount, state, amount, payTime) values (#{id}, #{tradeNo}, #{uid}, #{source}, #{type}, #{payAccount}, #{state}, #{amount}, #{payTime})
